ui_extension¶

UI Extension for Tracktor. This file is based on the original integration of Kitsu and Shotgrid made by the TIK Manager team.

class tik_tracktor.tracktor.ui_extension.UiExtensions(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)¶

Bases: ExtensionCore

This class creates a UI extension for Tracktor plugin in TIK Manager.

It will update the TIK UI to include an extra “Tracktor” menu with buttons, relevant to plugin’s functionality.

parent¶

The parent widget for the extension.

Type:

QWidget

feedback¶

Feedback dialog handler for user messages (from TIK Manager).

Type:

Feedback

add_main_menu()¶

Add the extension commands to the main menu.

build_ui()¶

Build the extension UI.

on_check_connection()¶

Checks wether Tracktor API is reachable.

on_create_project_from_tracktor()¶

Pulls the project from Tracktor

on_force_sync()¶

Overwrites the TIK project with Tracktor project data

on_login()¶

Logs the user into the Tracktor environment.

Returns:

True if login is successful or already logged in, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

on_logout()¶

Logs out the user from Tracktor

Tracktor VFX
